items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Higher
items.description: Gold settled 1.2% higher and silver rose nearly 0.7%, with both metals up for three consecutive sessions.

items.title: Dow Slips; Investors Dig Into More Bank Earnings

items.title: What Happens When Your House Burns Down and You Still Have a Mortgage?
items.description: Borrowers are still on the hook but might be able to pause payments.

items.title: Fixed-Income Investors Wrestle With Higher Yields Ahead of Inauguration
items.description: Bond investors are in for a bumpier ride than usual, as Treasury yields are expected to move sharply in the coming weeks on the heels of an unpredicta...

items.title: American Express to Pay $230 Million in Fines for Aggressive Sales Practices
items.description: The Wall Street Journal had reported on a series of deceptive and strong-arm tactics the card company used to increase small business sign-ups.
